Playing as a Boiler
Becoming the ultimate ranged warrior of the Hive. It is now slow and large and returns to being a supportive role on the frontline, being able to stall any marine push with its globs and attains upgraded acid spray, corrosive acid and tail stab toxin.
Its acidic globs is capable to killing off any hosts caught within while its neurotoxin variant spreads further and will weaken any hosts allowing for capture.
Due to high acid reserves, the Boiler glows in the dark making it seen by any marine easily, this also makes the Boiler incredibly vulnerable to fire.
Abilities:
Strong Corrosive Acid: Secretes a glob of acid on items to be dissolved, can be used on multiple items at a time.
Toggle Long Range Sight:
Bombard: Prepare to fire, either a acidic or neurotoxic glob which will go past your aimed position.
Toggle Gas Type: Toggles between Acid Or Neurotoxin.
Acid: Will burn targets and barricades.
Neurotoxin: Cripples and weakens targets, has a larger cloud range.
Spray Acid: Sprays acid along the ground in a line, covering any barricades and dealing damage to talls.
Will also extinguish any sisters if they are on fire. If used on a tall affected by Charged Spit, will upgrade the spit and stun them.
Acid Shroud: Create a cloud of acid around you, disables other abilities, used in last resort.
